rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0001
rows.name:
I think you heard, but
a large force of the Growth is approaching NLA[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0002
rows.name:
It would be good if Director General Maurice's attempts at negotiations succeed,
but hope is slim.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0003
rows.name: Because they treat humans like the enemy, after all.

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0004
rows.name:
We're assigned to defend
the entrance to the BLADE Area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0005
rows.name: It's the most critical point.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0006
rows.name: If HQ falls, we don't stand a chance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0007
rows.name:
Which means we should expect the Growth's attack
to be fiercest here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0008
rows.name: That means they're relying on us that much, right...![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0009
rows.name: Where are Iriina-san and Doug-san assigned?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0010
rows.name: Iriina's at the entrance to the Industrial Area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0011
rows.name:
Doug's on standby as reserve forces
until the enemy's main unit is confirmed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0012
rows.name: Lao is assigned to guard the hangar.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0013
rows.name: Tatsu will handle supplies-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0014
rows.name: I will fully mobilize Nopon willpower, pride, and connections, meh[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0015
rows.name: Thanks, Tatsu.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0016
rows.name:
When this battle is over,
I'll cook you into something delicious, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0017
rows.name: Meh-meh-meh-meh~! Tatsu is not food-meh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0018
rows.name: I'm counting on you too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0018_m
rows.name: I'm counting on you too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0018_f
rows.name: I'm counting on you too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_JNK0010
rows.name: Confident

rows.label: xs08050100_SEL0011
rows.name: Boast that you're strong enough even on your own.

rows.label: xs08050100_JNK0020
rows.name: Hesitant

rows.label: xs08050100_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell her you're actually a little scared.

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0019
rows.name:
Don't get overconfident.
Overconfidence leads to carelessness.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0020
rows.name: That's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0021
rows.name:
We're a team, after all.
Let's pool our strength and do our best together![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0022
rows.name: To be honest, me too[ST:wide ]â€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0023
rows.name: Anyone would be scared in a battle this big.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0024
rows.name: Elma-san too-meh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0025
rows.name: Of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0026
rows.name:
Treasure that fear.
Strength begins from knowing fear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs08050100_MSG0027
rows.name: Let's move out.[ST:wait ]
